holidays.title: International Digital Adoption (DAP) Professionals Day
holidays.description: International Digital Adoption (DAP) Professionals Day will be observed for the third time on the last Thursday of July — July 28 this year.

holidays.title: National Chili Dog Day
holidays.description: Do you want chili? ora hot dogs? Sometimes it doesn’t have to be so complicated.

holidays.title: National Scotch Day
holidays.description: In order to be considered scotch, this classy and distinctive spirit must be made in Scotland.

holidays.title: Ashura
holidays.description: Ashura is a holy day for Muslims, celebrated in the Islamic month of Muharram.

holidays.title: Bagpipe Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Bagpipe Appreciation Day is an annual event that celebrates the ancient musical instrument known as bagpipes.

holidays.title: Barbie-in-a-Blender Day
holidays.description: Let’s explore the story of Barbie and understand the reason behind Barbie-in-a-Blender Day.

holidays.title: Birthday of Dr. Jose Celso Barbosa
holidays.description: Dr. Barbosa’s innumerable contributions to the Puerto Rican statehood cause live on.

holidays.title: Chicken Finger Day
holidays.description: Get ready to drool as we discuss one of the most popular fast foods in America!

holidays.title: Cross Atlantic Communication Day
holidays.description: Let's celebrate Cross Atlantic Communication Day to honor the telegraph lines that connect the continents.

holidays.title: Earth Overshoot Day
holidays.description: Ever wonder how it will be if we run out of resources on our planet? Read on to find out.

holidays.title: Fast of Ninth of Av
holidays.description: The Fast of Ninth of Av is a national day to mourn and pray for Israel.

holidays.title: Gary Gygax Day
holidays.description: Let’s become mages, elves, or warriors for an afternoon and commemorate our love for D&D.

holidays.title: Iglesia ni Cristo Day
holidays.description: Time to wear your best clothes and visit the nearest Iglesia ni Cristo with your family.

holidays.title: National Carson Day
holidays.description: Let us make National Carson Day the best day ever for Carsons everywhere.

holidays.title: National Creme Brûlée Day
holidays.description: Indulge in this intensely creamy, crunchy and luxurious dish.

holidays.title: National Intern Day
holidays.description: Future leaders of the world unite! Today is National Intern Day.

holidays.title: National Korean War Veterans Armistice Day
holidays.description: This day honors the 5.7 million veterans of the Korean War and their ultimate sacrifice.

holidays.title: National Love is Kind Day
holidays.description: Let us be a part of a day that can bring relief to those who have suffered abuse.

holidays.title: National Nancy Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate the creative and optimistic personalities of all Nancys on National Nancy Day.

holidays.title: National New Jersey Day
holidays.description: New Jersey gets its day to commemorate when it joined the union.

holidays.title: National Refreshment Day
holidays.description: Hit the refresh button on your life by pausing to indulge in a refreshing drink.

holidays.title: National Roanoke Community Beautification Day
holidays.description: Let us beautify Southwest Virginia homes on National Roanoke Community Beautification Day.

holidays.title: National Sheila Day
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate our friends and everyone bearing the name Sheila on National Sheila Day.

holidays.title: National Sleepy Head Day
holidays.description: Unless you want to be jolted awake with a cold shower, get up early.

holidays.title: Norfolk Day
holidays.description: Did you know that Norfolk has been inhabited by humans for more than 300,000 years?

holidays.title: Take Your Houseplant For A Walk Day
holidays.description: When was the last time you took your houseplant out for a walk?

holidays.title: Take Your Pants for a Walk Day
holidays.description: Did you know walking has numerous benefits for the mind, body, and soul?

holidays.title: Tassoua
holidays.description: Learn important things about the Muslim culture as you get ready to celebrate Tasu’a.

holidays.title: Walk On Stilts Day
holidays.description: Strap on your stilts and join us in celebrating this exciting day!

holidays.title: Abby Roberts’s Birthday
holidays.description: This star has gained millions of followers across social media platforms, becoming a social media sensation.

holidays.description: This baseball star has achieved great success and is still rising and accomplishing many things.

holidays.title: Baby Goth’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no way but up for this superstar as her career is exponentially rising.

holidays.title: Danny Duncan’s Birthday
holidays.description: This YouTube sensation has exploded in popularity and shows no signs of slowing down.

holidays.title: Elvis the Alien’s Birthday
holidays.description: There is no stopping this sensational YouTuber, comedian, and reviewer on his path to success.

holidays.title: iDubbbzTV’s Birthday
holidays.description: He’s a YouTube star, comedian, and T.V. producer — what can’t he do?

holidays.title: Jacqueline Walters’s Birthday
holidays.description: She is a brilliant doctor who aspires to help others to the best of her abilities.

holidays.title: Robin Thede’s Birthday
